title: Reflection & Discussion — AI Environmental Scanning and Institutional Foresight
summary: Structured reflective workflow for analysing governance, equity, and institutional implications of AI-augmented environmental scanning.
design_intent: Support critical reflection and structured AI-assisted discussion on institutional foresight practices.

workflow.summary: Guide structured reflection on AI-supported environmental scanning and its institutional consequences.

steps.title: Step 1 — Awareness & Orientation
reflection_prompts: How does this affect institutional practice?

fields.label: Risks and Validation Checks
fields.placeholder: List at least three risks and three validation checks.

prompt_block.title: AI Reflection Support Prompt
prompt_block.prompt_template:
You are supporting structured institutional reflection.

Context type: {{context_type}}
Field/discipline: {{field_area}}
Level/scope: {{level_scope}}
Priorities: {{notes_priorities}}
Source material: {{source_material}}

Task:
1) Provide structured analysis.
2) Identify at least three risks.
3) Identify at least three validation checks.
4) Provide two context-specific examples.

Treat outputs as draft options for human review.

Return using headings:
A) Draft Output
B) Assumptions
C) Risks / Uncertainties
D) Validation Checks
E) Questions for Human Review
